mapper.insert: insert into plan(member_id, title, content, plan) values (#{memberId},#{title},#{content},#{plan});
mapper.select: select p.id,p.title,p.content,p.hit, m.login_id,p.plan from plan p, member m where p.member_id = m.id and p.id = #{id};

select count(*) from plan p join member m on p.member_id = m.id
